entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Greater Napanee
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:23 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 3.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kingston Airport 4:00 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: 3.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 89 %
Dewpoint: 1.6°C
Wind: ESE 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow or rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Rain showers or drizzle changing to snow this evening. Risk of freezing rain this evening and after midnight. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 8 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Overcast. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Overcast. Wind becoming north 20 km/h in the evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
